document_data.name: The Hunt
document_data.members: 14<ref group="note">[[Tanagost Arletoll]] was mentioned in the cited 2nd-edition sources as a member but was not included in the 1st-edition roster. This would have increased the 2nd-edition membership to 15.
document_data.mainbody: '''The Hunt''' was an [[adventuring company]] based in [[Selgaunt]].
document_data.Activities: The Hunt was active in the [[Cormyr]], [[Sembia]], [[Dalelands]], and [[Moonsea]] areas.
document_data.History:
Before [[1357 DR]], the Hunt suffered losses in [[Archendale]] while fighting local troops. Around [[1357 DR]], they were active in the [[Myth Drannor]] area.

While adventuring in Myth Drannor, [[Shasslan Timtrane]], [[Crommlar Muirel]], and [[Tanagost Arletoll]] were separated from the others and were ''[[teleport]]ed'' deep within [[Undermountain]]. Wounded, they eventually made their way to the [[Promenade of the Dark Maiden]] where they received shelter and healing.{{Cite dragon/176/If You Need Help - Ask the Drow!|22}} In [[1370 DR]], the three returned to the surface after exploring the palace of the dead [[necromancer]] [[Shradin Mulophor]] beneath [[Skullport]], during which they unwittingly brought his ''[[clone]]'' out of stasis.
document_data.Members:
The group consisted entirely of [[human]]s and was led by Shasslan Timtrane, a female [[fighter]].
* [[Crommlar Muirel]]
* [[Darrstul]]
* [[Gultim]]
* [[Heldorm Umbrav]]
* [[Illar Zund]]
* [[Laelin Blackhand]]
* [[Narbas]]
* [[Orlin Thabbar]]
* [[Shasslan Timtrane]]
* [[Szellim Thunn]]
* [[Tanagost Arletoll]]
* [[Thavran Torl]]
* [[Vhelt Marrim]]
* [[Voras Warburr]] 
* [[Zemmas]]
